inclusion.criterion: Recent stroke/TIA and severe stenosis of intracranial ICA or MCA
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Decompensated heart failure, usually class 3 or 4
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery. He also has a systolic murmur 3+/6+ in the neck, radiating to the skull.
